Light is a fundamental part of graphics, and today we learn how to emit it and how to react to it. And there are many, many (did I say many? there are many, just in case I didn’t make myself clear) ways of programming illumination in graphics. Some are better than others overall, some are more costly, some are just well-suited for real-time rendering like video games.
